remarks: The Selberg symmetry formula for products of three primes, instead of two.  The sum here can also be written in the symmetric form ` sum_ i j k <_ x , Lam ( i ) Lam ( j ) Lam ( k ) ` ; we eliminate one of the nested sums by using the definition of ` psi ( x ) = sum_ k <_ x , Lam ( k ) ` .  This statement can thus equivalently be written ` psi ( x ) log ^ 2 ( x ) = ` ` 2 sum_ i j k <_ x , Lam ( i ) Lam ( j ) Lam ( k ) + O ( x log x ) ` . Equation 10.4.23 of [Shapiro], p. 422.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
